summary: This is a declaration of authenticity from AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst Brian Faulkner, stating that after a thorough search, no responsive information was found for a request related to GLDC file number 3257380 in Palm Beach County, Florida. The document serves as a formal certification under penalty of perjury.

persons.name: Brian Faulkner
persons.context: He attests under penalty of perjury that a thorough search of AT&T records found no information responsive to a request related to GLDC file number 3257380.

events.title: AT&T Declaration of Authenticity Filed
events.description: Brian Faulkner, a Legal Compliance Analyst at AT&T, signed a declaration under penalty of perjury stating that no responsive information was found for a request related to GLDC file number 3257380.

keyFacts: AT&T conducted a search for records responsive to a request related to GLDC file number 3257380.
Brian Faulkner, an AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst, certified under penalty of perjury that no responsive information was found.
The declaration was signed on July 19, 2021, in Palm Beach County, Florida.
The document is a formal legal certification pursuant to 28 U.S.C. ยง 1746.
The file number 3257380 suggests this is part of an official investigation or legal proceeding.
